title: Village RPG Music
description: 13 village themes that will give more life to your video game sound.
longDescription:
Village Music RPG

Add fantasy, atmosphere and an exploration vibe to your games with these 13 village themes (divided in 50 tracks so you can create interactive music) that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price. 1 hour and 11 minutes of music.


🔊 YouTube Preview - Listen to the tracks

📜 Tracklist PDF


More about the pack:

- This pack can be complemented with: RPG/Fantasy Music Pack

- The songs on the pack are useful for village themes, exploration, calm moments, , cinematics, etc...

- This music tracks are perfect to set up a village atmosphere.

- Made with mainly orchestral instruments but also with ethnic elements.

- The pack contains stems so you can create interactive music.

- Every theme comes with an additional non-looped version.

- The songs on the pack can be used in various situations in the gameplay.

- Intuitive file naming.


----------------------


[Format]

All files are in:

WAV - Stereo 44.1 Khz, 16bit
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 50

Number of Audio Cues: 50

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1 hour and 11 minutes
